remarks: Lemma for ~ infxpen .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement:
leweon.1 $e |- L = { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. ( On X. On ) /\ y e. ( On X. On ) ) /\ ( ( 1st ` x ) e. ( 1st ` y ) \/ ( ( 1st ` x ) = ( 1st ` y ) /\ ( 2nd ` x ) e. ( 2nd ` y ) ) ) ) } $.
r0weon.1 $e |- R = { <. z , w >. | ( ( z e. ( On X. On ) /\ w e. ( On X. On ) ) /\ ( ( ( 1st ` z ) u. ( 2nd ` z ) ) e. ( ( 1st ` w ) u. ( 2nd ` w ) ) \/ ( ( ( 1st ` z ) u. ( 2nd ` z ) ) = ( ( 1st ` w ) u. ( 2nd ` w ) ) /\ z L w ) ) ) } $.
infxpen.1 $e |- Q = ( R i^i ( ( a X. a ) X. ( a X. a ) ) ) $.
infxpen.2 $e |- ( ph <-> ( ( a e. On /\ A. m e. a ( _om C_ m -> ( m X. m ) ~~ m ) ) /\ ( _om C_ a /\ A. m e. a m ~< a ) ) ) $.
infxpen.3 $e |- M = ( ( 1st ` w ) u. ( 2nd ` w ) ) $.
infxpen.4 $e |- J = OrdIso ( Q , ( a X. a ) ) $.
infxpenlem $p |- ( ( A e. On /\ _om C_ A ) -> ( A X. A ) ~~ A ) $.
$d A a $.
$d J w $.
$d L w z $.
$d M m z $.
$d Q z $.
$d a m w x y z $.
$d ph w z $.
